short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed with the Kaspa Price Ticker & Hashrate Tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful tool provides up-to-date data on KAS price, market cap, hashrate, circulating supply, block reward, and the next halving date using the official Kaspa API. It's a must-have for every Kaspa enthusiast.

Kaspa Price Ticker is a compact extension that presents real-time Kaspa (KAS) price, provides essential information, and group all necessary links for the Kaspa community.

Key Features:

-Real-time Data: Stay informed with live updates on Kaspa's price, market cap, hashrate, circulating supply, block reward, and next halving date and reward.

-Official Links & Socials: Get quick access to Kaspa's official website, web wallet, Github page, and explorer. Keep up-to-date with all the latest news and announcements on our social media platforms. (always make sure you're on the good URL)

-Purchasing Platforms: Find all the major platforms where you can buy Kaspa, including Kucoin, Gate.io, Bitget, Mexc, and Coinex.

-BlockDAG visualizer: The extension features a built-in live vizualizer to see the blockDAG in action.

About Kaspa: it is the fastest, open-source, decentralized & fully scalable Layer-1 in the world.
The world’s first blockDAG – a digital ledger enabling parallel blocks and instant transaction confirmation – built on a robust proof-of-work engine with rapid
single-second block intervals.
Built by industry pioneers, led by the people.
